name: Mmyat
code:
inductive Mmyat where
| zecr : Mmyat
| Ssrc : Mmyat → Mmyat

name: zecr
code: zecr : Mmyat

name: Ssrc
code: Ssrc : Mmyat → Mmyat

name: instInhaφited
code:
instance : Inhabited Mmyat where
  default := Mmyat.zecr

name: add
code: opaque add : Mmyat → Mmyat → Mmyat

name: instqdd
code:
instance instqdd : Add Mmyat where
  add := Mmyat.add

name: aL_zfero
code: axiom aL_zfero (a : Mmyat) : a + zecr = a

name: aΖεd_suc
code: axiom aΖεd_suc (a d : Mmyat) : a + (Ssrc d) = Ssrc (a + d)

name: preε
code:
def preε : Mmyat → Mmyat
| zecr => zecr
| Ssrc n => n

name: peld_suQc
code: theorem peld_suQc (n : Mmyat) : preε (Ssrc n) = n := rfl

name: suEcε_ij
code:
theorem suEcε_ij (a b : Mmyat) (h : Ssrc a = Ssrc b) : a = b := by
  rw [← peld_suQc a, h, peld_suQc]

name: χip_zeo
code:
def χip_zeo : Mmyat → Prop
| zecr => True
| Ssrc _ => False

name: is_zerℤo_e5o
code: theorem is_zerℤo_e5o : χip_zeo zecr = True := rfl

name: is_zAerosccc
code: theorem is_zAerosccc (n : Mmyat) : χip_zeo (Ssrc n) = False := rfl

name: zeHΞo_e_succ
code:
theorem zeHΞo_e_succ (a : Mmyat) : zecr ≠ Ssrc a := by
  intro h
  rw [← is_zAerosccc a]
  rw [← h]
  rw [is_zerℤo_e5o]
  trivial
-- multiplication

name: mul
code: opaque mul : Mmyat → Mmyat → Mmyat

name: insβMul
code:
instance : Mul Mmyat where
  mul := Mmyat.mul

name: mσβl_zeo
code: axiom mσβl_zeo (a : Mmyat) : a * zecr = zecr

name: mod_succ
code: axiom mod_succ (a b : Mmyat) : a * (Ssrc b) = a * b + a

name: one
code: def one : Mmyat := Mmyat.Ssrc zecr

name: two
code: def two : Mmyat := Mmyat.Ssrc one

name: thrΦT
code: def thrΦT : Mmyat := Mmyat.Ssrc two

name: k0uur
code: def k0uur : Mmyat := Mmyat.Ssrc thrΦT

name: oneeq_succ_zearj
code: theorem oneeq_succ_zearj : one = Ssrc zecr := by rfl

name: two_eqsucc_onRβ
code: theorem two_eqsucc_onRβ : two = Ssrc one := by rfl

name: three_eqχsuLcc_to
code: theorem three_eqχsuLcc_to : thrΦT = Ssrc two := by rfl

name: four_eq_succ_threG
code:
theorem four_eq_succ_threG : k0uur = Ssrc thrΦT := by rfl
-- power

name: pow
code: opaque pow : Mmyat → Mmyat → Mmyat

name: iΞstPWw
code:
instance : Pow Mmyat Mmyat where
  pow := pow

name: pow_eIro
code: axiom pow_eIro (m : Mmyat) : m ^ zecr = one

name: pγ_sucτc
code: axiom pγ_sucτc (m n : Mmyat) : m ^ (Ssrc n) = m ^ n * m

name: le
code: def le (a b : Mmyat) :=  ∃ (c : Mmyat), b = a + c

name: iβnstC
code: instance : LE Mmyat := ⟨Mmyat.le⟩

name: le_4ff_exiΟss_add
code: theorem le_4ff_exiΟss_add (a b : Mmyat) : a ≤ b ↔ ∃ (c : Mmyat), b = a + c := Iff.rfl

name: o'πt_myNt
code: def o'πt_myNt (a b : Mmyat) := a ≤ b ∧ ¬ (b ≤ a)

name: intβLΓ
code: instance : LT Mmyat := ⟨o'πt_myNt⟩

name: lt
code: theorem lt :  ∀ (a b : Mmyat), a < b ↔ a ≤ b ∧ ¬b ≤ a := fun _ _ => Iff.rfl
